timeline.message:
Add error recovery

1. Start a service only when dependencies are ready
1. Stop a service when dependency errored.
1. Restart a service automatically when dependency is recovered.
1. Small fixes:
  1. Kernel shutdown wait until all tasks being processed before kernel process exit.
  1. Rename Shutdown to Broken.

replies.bodyText:
runOnPublishQueueAndwait will queue the executorService.shutdown() after other state change events. executorService.shutdown() will stop the executorService accepting new tasks, but will still run the existing tasks.
awaitTermination() waits for existing tasks to finish within a timeout before process exits.
